title: Authors and Citation
text: Su P (2025). cqcs: Censored quantile correlation based screening. R package version 0.1.0, https://pengsu517.github.io/cqcs/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {cqcs: Censored quantile correlation based screening},   author = {Peng Su},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://pengsu517.github.io/cqcs/}, }

title: Censored quantile correlation based screening
text: cqcs package provides functions compute CQC (censored quantile correlation) proposed Peng Su, Ruoxuan Zhang Maozai Tian. included simulation workflow (simu analysis) vignettes.

title: Censored quantile correlation based screening
text: two key functions package. function cqcor used caculate CQC two variables, can used screen variables. function cqcs used screen variables based CQC.
code: cqcor(y, d, x, tau)  # y: response variable,  # d: censoring indicator,  # x: covariate,  # tau: quantile level cqcs(y, d, x, tau = 0.5, len = 100)  # y: response variable,  # d: censoring indicator,  # x: covariates,  # tau: quantile level,  # len: screening length
